urls.title: Cancellation and refund
urls.description: Travel plans can often change unexpectedly. Regardless of that, our services help you reach your destination. Using online refund option, Lufthansa flight bookings* can be cancelled and refunded online up to 24 hours before the beginning of your trip. The refund or cancellation of purchased tickets depends on the type of tickets bought.
